PARAGRAPH.STRING: is the second highest mountain in the Garhwal region of India, after Nanda Devi, 7,816 m (25,643 ft).
lies in the Chamoli District of Uttarakhand, close to the border with Tibet.

is the third highest mountain in India (according to India however, the rank is much lower as it includes in its list of mountains all those in Pakistan occupied Kashmir), and the 29th highest in the world.

is most properly considered part of (and the highest summit in) the Zaskar (or Zanskar) Range, which lies north of the main chain of the Himalaya, between the Suru River and the upper Karnali River. In appearance
resembles a giant pyramid topped by a flat summit area with two peaks.
